component.name: GetPeakPosteriors
component.doc: This component predicts sites for a given WM on given sequences and relates the predictions to chip-seq signal. Input files are sequences from the coordinates given by PeakMerger (non refined peaks), region coverage files over these sequences, a weight matrix and the peakstats file of SelectPeaksMM. The peakstats file contains the peaks selected inside the non refined peaks from PeakMerger and corresonding statistics (height, RMSD (quality), mu, sigma). As output it produces 2 files: -peakstats -TFBSstats These two files are then used by GetStatistics component. This component uses drmaa to submit to the cluster
component.author: Severin

input.name: train_set
input.doc: Typically one half of top 1000 peak sequences. train_set and bg_train_set are pooled and then used by MotEvo to estimate a prior for the given WM. This prior is then used to predict sites on regions.

input.name: statsfile
input.doc: Output file of RecompZ containing statistics of each fitted Gaussian.

output.name: peakstats
output.doc: File with all the statistics for each peak.

output.name: TFBSstats
output.doc: File with all the statistics of each TFBS.

parameter.name: minposterior
parameter.doc: Posterior cut-off to call site true and to print TFBS in peak_plots

parameter.name: markovorder
parameter.doc: Parameter for MotEvo: Order of background model (0 single base frequencies, 1 di-base frequencies, etc.). If 0, component computes single base frequencies first.

parameter.name: genome
parameter.doc: Genome assembly (hg19, mm9 and dm3 are allowed).

parameter.name: read_files
parameter.doc: Used to get fragment length. FragmentLength component stores fragment length in a file with certain relative location to the read_files.

parameter.name: files_per_job
parameter.doc: Number of region coverage files that should be submitted in one job.
